meanings.definition: A small, adhesive label or sticker used for decoration or identification.
meanings.sent1: I put a postique on my notebook to make it look pretty.
meanings.sent2: She bought colorful postiques to label her school supplies.
meanings.sent3: The postique on the gift box added a nice touch to the present.
meanings.sent4: Her laptop was covered in postiques, making it stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The postique with a smiley face brightened up the plain folder.

meanings.definition: To affix a postique to a surface.
meanings.sent1: Please postique the note on the bulletin board.
meanings.sent2: He carefully postiques the price tags on the products.
meanings.sent3: She tried to postique the paper on the wall, but it kept falling off.
meanings.sent4: The artist postiqued the painting on the canvas with precision.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to postique their artwork around the room.

meanings.definition: The act of using postiques for crafting or organizing.
meanings.sent1: Crafting with postiques is a fun way to personalize items.
meanings.sent2: Organizing her desk with postiques helped her find things easily.
meanings.sent3: The postique party turned into a creative mess of stickers everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a postique wonderland, with labels on every drawer.
meanings.sent5: The postique frenzy at the store inspired her to start a crafting project.
